short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to take a 20-second break every 20 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect Your Eyes from Digital Strain with the 20-20-20 Eye Break Reminder!

Staring at screens for extended periods can cause eye fatigue, dryness, and headaches. The 20-20-20 rule is a simple technique recommended by optometrists to alleviate eye strain:

Every 20 minutes, take a 20-second break, and look at something 20 feet away.
Key Features:

🕑 Automatic Reminders: Get a gentle notification every 20 minutes.
🔄 Easy On/Off Toggle: Quickly enable or disable reminders via the extension popup.
👁️ User-Friendly Interface: Simple design focused on functionality.
📊 Lightweight and Efficient: Minimal impact on your browser's performance.
Benefits:

🌟 Reduce Eye Strain: Helps prevent discomfort from prolonged screen time.
🚀 Improve Productivity: Short breaks can enhance focus and efficiency.
💼 Ideal for Professionals and Students: Perfect for anyone who spends long hours in front of a computer.
How to Use:

Install the extension.
Click on the extension icon to open the popup.
Use the toggle switch to turn reminders on or off.

Note: The extension starts with reminders turned on by default.
